name: 3dnpc
body:
### 欢迎来到Interesting NPCs协作汉化项目
Interesting NPCs主页：http://3dnpc.com/  
N网地址：http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8429/  
作者：Kris Takahashi  
汉化进展：https://github.com/txl263/3DNPC  

![3DNPC](http://i.imgur.com/qNuVejF.png)  

![Nasrin by Inara](http://3dnpc.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/nasrin_lores.jpg)  

<iframe width="640" height="360" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/lcZ96ejafQ4?feature=player_detailpage" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
